data.text: Sunday: China takes on the rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of March. Follow @Chinamission2un for updates. https://t.co/h5XTA8YaWV https://t.co/Yrtc6Bz2Uk

Women must be allowed to make decisions about their own bodies.

On Sunday's #ZeroDiscrimination Day, join @UNAIDS and demand sexual and reproductive health and rights for all women and girls: https://t.co/y5I8rJLXZx https://t.co/dYtB2Jpdps

Left to care for her three children on her own, a young mother in Iran turned to selling cookies to make ends meet. 

See how @FAO supported her efforts & helped create new job opportunities for women. https://t.co/nyMvg9V9AH

Women belong in all places where decisions are made.

On Sunday's #ZeroDiscrimination Day, @UNAIDS is challenging the discrimination faced by women & girls in order to mobilize action to promote their equality and empowerment. https://t.co/eib9wmEIdU https://t.co/hSFRGDDSeT

Women's full, equal & meaningful participation is essential for sustainable peace.

New photo essay celebrates the strength, leadership & invaluable contributions of women to peace & security around the world. https://t.co/Iv3PDCyEn9 @UNpeacekeeping https://t.co/oMVang0sxQ

The #coronavirus outbreak has led to a rise of harmful stereotypes. Preventing stigma is key in the fight against #COVID19. 

Get the facts from @WHO: https://t.co/KKAMDsrfQK https://t.co/5cA4yVAH4f

"It is time to stop trying to change women, and start changing the systems that prevent them from achieving their potential."

-- @antonioguterres calling for the 21st century to be the century of women's equality. https://t.co/V3MLjiOXqO https://t.co/tqnFu36R7T

Democratic Republic of Congo: no new confirmed cases of Ebola virus reported over a full week for the first time since beginning of international response.

@WHO is working to contain disease to relatively small geographic areas amid continuing insecurity. https://t.co/zrrRn1u9yX https://t.co/6KBZFHP4ca

“Without urgent action, the risk of even greater escalation grows by the hour."

Fresh vegetables grown by female farmers in Bangladesh are helping to feed refugees in Cox's Bazar thanks to a new farmer's market initiative from @WFP. 

More on their life-saving efforts to achieve #ZeroHunger. https://t.co/KWIZ4rmcWn

🍏 The food we eat,
🌬️ the air we breathe, 
💧 the water we drink 
all rely on biodiversity. 

Protecting the planet's biodiversity means protecting our future. https://t.co/wQ5Xa3UZVb via @FAO #ClimateAction 

https://t.co/8HKFltA1A2

By using non-synthetic, locally-sourced products, zero-budget natural farming: 

⬇️ Reduces farmers’ direct costs 

⬆️ Boosts yields & farm health 

@UNEP is helping to measure its impact on people & the planet: https://t.co/LrwPfNshwB #ClimateAction

More on how the UN is working to help the Libyan people. https://t.co/w2NpqyxUFK

Data, analysis and recommendations by the UN contributed to this milestone.

Early education in children's mother tongue is crucial to ensure quality of learning.

UN programmes & agencies prepare to meet immediate needs & boost resilience. https://t.co/kuJfAuoWzk

More on Thursday's #SocialJusticeDay: https://t.co/CCZAy5f50x https://t.co/PVd33kYq0m
